text: tadera ki pa ache, yadbara tara calaphera kare, kimba tadera ki hata ache, yadbara tara dhare. Athaba tadera ki cokha ache yadbara tara dekhate paya kimba tadera ki kana ache yadbara sunate paya? Bale da'o, tomara daka tomadera ansidaradigake, atahpara amara amangala kara ebam amake abakasa di'o na.
